name: Sid Note
catch: More detailed than TAB notation for bass
description: Web app for viewing and practicing bass fingering with more specific notation than TAB. Chord practice, fretboard practice, and song tracks included.

features.title: More Detailed Than TAB
features.description: Provides more specific fingering information than standard tablature. Visualize exact finger positions.

features.title: Chord Practice Modes
features.description: 4 modes: Chromatic, Pentatonic, Diatonic, and All Chord practice.

features.title: Fretboard & Fingering
features.description: Separate exercises for fretboard navigation and finger positioning technique.

features.title: Song Tracks
features.description: Practice with real songs: FF5, Vaundy, Stand By Me, and more.
